17  std::string Node::convertPositionToNodeId(AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3& _position)
18  {
19  AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3 pos = averagePosition(_position);
20  std::string id = std::to_string(pos.x) + "|" + std::to_string(pos.y) + "|" + std::to_string(pos.z);

24  AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3 Node::averagePosition(AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3& _position)
25  {
26  float averaged_x;
27  float averaged_y;
28  float averaged_z;
29 
30  if ( std::fmod(_position.x, Node::NodeSizeX)/Node::NodeSizeX > 0.5f )
31  averaged_x = _position.x + (Node::NodeSizeX - (_position.x , Node::NodeSizeX));
32  else
33  averaged_x = _position.x - std::fmod(_position.x , Node::NodeSizeX);
34 
35  if (std::fmod(_position.y , Node::NodeSizeY)/Node::NodeSizeY > 0.5f )
36  averaged_y = _position.y + (Node::NodeSizeY - (_position.y , Node::NodeSizeY));
37  else
38  averaged_y = _position.y - std::fmod(_position.y , Node::NodeSizeY);
39 
40  if ( std::fmod(_position.z, Node::NodeSizeZ)/Node::NodeSizeZ > 0.5f )
41  averaged_z = _position.z + (Node::NodeSizeZ - (_position.z , Node::NodeSizeZ));
42  else
43  averaged_z = _position.z - std::fmod(_position.z , Node::NodeSizeZ);
44 
45  AlleyHoopROSUtils::Vector3 averagedPosition(averaged_x, averaged_y, averaged_z);
46  return averagedPosition;
47  }
